website_summaries.verdict: Entire hair regrowth system provides you with all your hair growth needs.
pros: Blows away competition in every way
Removes dirt and buildup while stimulating the scalp
Special needle-nosed design for precise application so you don't waste any of the product
Contains FDA-approved ingredients to regrow hair
Moisturizes and volumizes while it regrows hair
cons: This is the most expensive item on our list

customer_reviews.title: A lot of money for nothing
customer_reviews.text: Once you figure out that this is just Rogaine with a very expensive price tag you will wish you didn't waste your money. The others items do nothing to stop hair loss. You can purchase all kinds of product in the drug store that add volume for so much less money and higher quality. The shampoo really dried out my hair, this is the low strength Rogaine that you have to use 2x day. I wish I didn't try it or it would go back. So if you are a woman who Iosing hair just buy the regular Rogaine and a good shampoo and conditioner the rog
customer_reviews.author: Lisa K

customer_reviews.title: Health
customer_reviews.text: I sent it back as soon as I read the labels. The possible side effects were too much to take a chance of using the product.
customer_reviews.author: Ava

customer_reviews.title: Bad results
customer_reviews.text: The keranique shampoo & conditioner made my hair course & very tangled. The hair growth serum caused daily headaches. Due to these reactions, I stopped the products & returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Still waiting to see if this product works. The ...
customer_reviews.text: Still waiting to see if this product works. The amount of product is not enough to last 30 days. It lasted me 2 weeks, which is not enough ime to see any progress. Costly!!
customer_reviews.author: Trea

customer_reviews.title: There is nothing to like about this product
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing to like about this product: it is very expensive and provided absolutely no results for me. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Since using Keranique, my hair has been breaking off ...
customer_reviews.text: Since using Keranique, my hair has been breaking off a lot; either breaking off or falling out, I don't know which. Stopped using lift & repair spray entirely. Don't use the conditioner because it flattens my hair too much. The regrowth spray runs all over my head, down my neck and down my face.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I used 1 full bottle of shampoo and conditioner however ...
customer_reviews.text: I used 1 full bottle of shampoo and conditioner however I did not see a change in hair growth or volume
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: Saved my own view of my hair
customer_reviews.text: Used this for nearly 40 days. It helped the regrowth of my hair greatly. Serious changes and visible changes in 2 weeks and amazing growth in 30 days. Highly satisfied and relieved to see my hair fill out again.
customer_reviews.author: Zoraida C.

customer_reviews.title: The disputed order from Joyce Shade
customer_reviews.text: First and foremost I like the product, second I’m disputing the second order because it was only supposed to have been a one time order when I spoke to the representative she knew that cause she process the order “ and later they proceded to take more money for more orders I really didn’t like them going in my money 💰
customer_reviews.author: Joyce shade

customer_reviews.title: Good results!
customer_reviews.text: The shampoo for instance even though it leaves the hair soft, still has enough body. Also, using the conditioner leaves the hair not too soft. Even though I have just been taking the loss treatment for about 3 weeks, I'm confident that it will have a some positive effect. I can already feel - with my hands - some very short stubbles.
customer_reviews.author: ARKO

customer_reviews.title: causes high blood presure!
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for two weeks, my upper lip started to quiver. I stopped using the product and started using it again two weeks later and the same thing happened. It caused my blood pressure to spike. I called the manufacturer, they told me that the chemicals in the product can cause this reaction. They will not take it back because I did not purchase it from them. I am past the time to be able to return it to Amazon. I am out $50.00!
customer_reviews.author: Delphi

customer_reviews.title: Worked in a month for me!!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE ALL OF THIS!!! My hair has grown 2 inches in a month and a half. My hair feels more thick and shiny.
customer_reviews.author: Jessy

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: THE SELLER DID NOT DISCLOSE ALL THE DANGEROUS WARNINGS, AFTER READING THE PACKAGE (WHICH I NEVER OPENED) MY DOCTOR SAID NOT TO USE IT !! AND NOW I CANNOT RETURN IT. IF YOU KNOW ANYONE WHO STILL WANTS IT, PLEASE CONTACT ME AND THEY CAN BUY IT FROM ME.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca P

customer_reviews.title: Dried hair out
customer_reviews.text: Don’t know if it works or not. Quit using it. Made my hair super dry and faded my hair color very noticeably at the roots.
customer_reviews.author: Chicky43545

customer_reviews.title: Works works works
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Makes my hair so clean. And I already see new growth. The styling products are the best! I’ve only used it a month and the fullness is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela McFarland

customer_reviews.title: Scalp irritation, cannot continue to use.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted so badly for Keranique to work for me but it burns and irritates my scalp to no end. This product has left my scalp red and scaly. If I could give this product no stars, I would. Even the shampoo & conditioner strip my hair of all its moisture. $70 down the drain because I’m throwing this “hair regrowth system” in the trash where it belongs. I’d rather be bald than in pain. 😩😭
customer_reviews.author: Jio

customer_reviews.title: Hair looks fuller
customer_reviews.text: This makes my hair look and feel fuller. It seems that I have less loss of hair after I shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn DeMoss

customer_reviews.title: Need more time to re
customer_reviews.text: I can't tell you to much about the product because I have only used it 3 times. So far I like the way my hair feels and looks. I am disappointed with the size of the product. I thought they were larger.
customer_reviews.author: Tami

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT trust anything that is not returnable!
customer_reviews.text: Not returnable, yet deliverable? After reading most of the reviews, I agree with most. I should have read them before I got sucked in to purchase. I am afraid to try it.
customer_reviews.author: Carol R.

customer_reviews.title: As far as length goes didn't do much but did ...
customer_reviews.text: As far as length goes didn't do much but did wonders for health. Repaired my hair and made it look 10 times healthier that alone was worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlynn Ruble

customer_reviews.title: Full hair
customer_reviews.text: Worked good on my hair. Lost a lot after doing the keto diet. Needed my hair to feel full again. This did the trick.
customer_reviews.author: kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I am 60 years old and have noticed thinning hair over the last year as well as my hair getting very dry from age and blow drying and the curling iron. I had to stop the styling do to the fact it was drying out so bad, so I thought I would try out the Keranique. I have been using Keranique for little over 2 weeks now, I have noticed its makes my hair feel fuller, still to soon to know how will the hair growth goes, but will keep you posted. Thank you for the opportunity to try out your product. I hope it does not disappoint me.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Haskins

customer_reviews.title: Grow Hair
customer_reviews.text: It did not work for me and I can not turn this product, I did not know this when I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This product didn't work for me. I think my hair loss is hereditary. :-(
customer_reviews.author: Lil Sis

customer_reviews.title: Thicker looking hair.
customer_reviews.text: The scent was nice, not perfumy. Lathered well too. Too soon to tell but it appeared thicker and healthier already.
customer_reviews.author: carolyn e hostutler

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I like the serum, rest is no better than off the shelf products.
customer_reviews.author: seahag9

customer_reviews.title: Helpful with hair loss reduction
customer_reviews.text: This product did seem to help with the hair loss reduction. I am still using some of the product. I just wish there were more shampoo & conditioner in the pkg.
customer_reviews.author: DORSEY G BELL

customer_reviews.title: You Can’t Return This
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t use this product because I realized I had used it before and it makes me itch. I don’t think it is worth the price either. Had I bought it at a store it would be easy to take back. The product seems more for color treated hair than specifically for those of us who have hair loss due to other things. There are other products so do your research wisely. The seller did get it to me quickly and none of this is his or her fault.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy B. McDonell, Ph.D.

customer_reviews.title: Bullied into monthly subscription with no way to cancel
customer_reviews.text: Loved the shampoo and conditioner. But I don’t like to be stuck in a subscription when I won’t even use half of the product sent. Tried to cancel but there is not way out of it going to cancel credit card. I want to be able to chose the days I get my product and what products I want and don’t want please cancel my subscription I don’t want this on a monthly basis it is a wast of money. I would have kept some but not all.
customer_reviews.author: cynthia

customer_reviews.title: not impressed
customer_reviews.text: the bottles were small for the price. couldn't really tell that it helped my hair at all. do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I felt like the shampoo bottle was not full. Only was able to do about 5 washes. Conditioner did not smell the same as the original keranique I ordered after direct from the keranique website
customer_reviews.author: Atate

customer_reviews.title: Thickens hair
customer_reviews.text: This works!!! I feel a great difference. Hair looks fuller. Waiting to see regrowth.
customer_reviews.author: norma e medina

customer_reviews.title: The sprayer doesn’t work. Wasted money. I wish I had a new one because the product itself works.
customer_reviews.text: The products themselves are nice and Im pleased so far with the results. With the sprayer, I’m really frustrated. The sprayer has never worked properly or consistently. It finally stopped working all together. I was forced to open the cap of the bottle to manually apply it to my hair. The sprayer piece broke off inside and this expensive solution is wasted. I want my money back or I want them to send a new sprayer bottle that works properly.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Felts

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for a month now not sure if it will benefit me or not. I had thyroid issues about ten yrs. ago and my hair fell out, took a chance on this and hoping it will help grow my hair but maybe its too late. Its not hard to do its not too much and if you have issues with hair falling out maybe try this to keep your hair in shape.
customer_reviews.author: SUSAN

customer_reviews.title: Read everything and know what you are buying.
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware!! Read everything carefully before you buy. I did not. I paid over $50 for four SMALL items. When the box arrived I wondered how it could all fit in that small box. Then after I opened it, thinking I didn’t want to pay so much for so little, I decided to return it. But again I didn’t read everything and it is not returnable. All I can hope for now is that it will actually do what it claims. Maybe I’ll feel differently if it does work!!! I can’t give this any stars yet but I have to give at least one to submit.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Wastes of money!!
customer_reviews.text: Did not get the results expected. This products did not make hair grow in the things arears. Would not buy this product again
customer_reviews.author: Sherrie

customer_reviews.title: This works for me!
customer_reviews.text: I definitely see a difference although the company insists on using it for 2 months. I already love it and it's barely a month. The shampoo and conditioner are very different from other shampoos but I love that my hair is not as frizzy (I only shampoo 2-3 times per week). I have new hair now. Definitely thicker. Definitely ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: Suz.A

customer_reviews.title: Really works
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Glad amazon caries product. Pricey but works. My husband had Dementia so I order As many thing on line possible!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Gaw

customer_reviews.title: to stop hair from falling out
customer_reviews.text: When I used the shampoo more of my hair fell out than ever before. I called the company and they said i needed to purchase a serum and mask product to use first. I wish I had this information first.I ordered it but I am not sure if I will proceed with the product. I also ordered a scalp calmer from another company. Before this, I have been usinng a tea tree shampoo and conditioner which did not take out so much hair.
customer_reviews.author: carolyn sachs

customer_reviews.title: Love the product
customer_reviews.text: I really love the product except for the serum you put in twice a day. The serum has a texture that doesn’t mesh with my hair. Rogaine seems to have a better texture. But the shampoo conditioner and spray are wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Patt

customer_reviews.title: Check w your physician
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, when I told my physician that I was going to begin using the product, she advised against it. The side effects, for me, were contraindicated. Phooey! So, I’ll have to live with thining hair and bald spots. Regretfully, I’ll be returning the unopened kit. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Judith

customer_reviews.title: Product is not working for me
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for over a month now and I have been losing twice as much hair as before. The product makes my hair look and feel thicker but that is deceptive because I've lost so much hair.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Lemon

customer_reviews.title: Ok???
customer_reviews.text: Not sure this is helping but I’m not using daily as it says to do. I only wash my hair 2 times per week but I’m still not seeing anything amazing. Everything is a scam.
customer_reviews.author: KelleyBelly

customer_reviews.title: I was hopeful this would work unfortunately not
customer_reviews.text: I believe this product would have worked but it gave me a terrible headache after using it for the first 3 to 4 days I was getting a headache I had to stop using it then I decided I was going to do without it for two weeks and start it again and the same thing happened so I had to cancel cannot use product any longer.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Package was destroyed !!
customer_reviews.text: I just received and so Excited to start using today. Unfortunately, the product was spilled and destroyed before I opened the box. So disappointed. Called in immediately and glad to get full refund from Amazon 👍
customer_reviews.author: Goodsenses

customer_reviews.title: Adverse affect
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for over 30 days . I lost more hair on this product . I now have bald spots .
customer_reviews.author: Sharlotte

customer_reviews.title: Her care product
customer_reviews.text: A great hair product for those looking to repair or establish hair growth I will definitely recommend this for family and friends
customer_reviews.author: Miki hues

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these products for 2-3 months and my hair is more manageable but I don’t have any more hair growth that I can find.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me. Wish I could get a refund.
customer_reviews.text: Lost more hair than when I first started using. Trying to recover now.
customer_reviews.author: Noni

customer_reviews.title: Works as stated
customer_reviews.text: Product works really well. I had more volume with the first shampoo. Hair appears thicker.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this product- Regrew my hairline
customer_reviews.text: Excellent set of products. I have been using this line since March 2020 and my hairline has regrown, been restored to teenage levels. I can see tons of short hairs all over my head that are *new*. Love how simple and effective this product line is. Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: SELLER CALLS THIS HAZARDOUS MATERIAL!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this starter kit but decided I didn't want it as i'm trying a lot of other hair products. When i went to process the return, I found that the seller does not accept returns because they classify the product as HAZARDOUS MATERIAL. Ridiculous and just an excuse for bad customer service. I won't be buying anything from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa

customer_reviews.title: Must try!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! Does what it says! I did see more fullness & more hair growth. Will be purchaseing this again but in bigger bottles!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: This made matters worse.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for my wife because her hair has been thinning. But this product just made it worse. Her hair became more tangled than ever. I will not reccomend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Blessed

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: This product made my hair and scalp feel horrible. And made my hair impossible to style. And bc it's full of chemicals and gasses its un returnable, which I do not recall seeing when I purchased it. Save your money ladies
customer_reviews.author: tracy vega

customer_reviews.title: Shedding
customer_reviews.text: My hair was just thinning just a little bit not bad at all.... this product said that I would have light shedding.... if by light shedding meant taking handfuls of hair.... and now I have bald spots... I highly do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: kirsten kline

customer_reviews.title: Looking for a new product
customer_reviews.text: Great product good on the hair but don't use a lot my hair was itching like crazy. Customer service sent a article out saying wash hair in shower that helped. Still watching for growth only been using product for a little over 2 months but hair does look and feel better.
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Hair regrowth
customer_reviews.text: The product started to replace my hair within a few weeks. I will buy this again. The tubes of shampoo and conditioner are easy to use in the shower. My hair has never felt cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Book addict

customer_reviews.title: It seems to work
customer_reviews.text: Hair seems fuller, easier to manage. Do not know about regrowth.
customer_reviews.author: Claribel L Ingraham

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Good product leaves hair smooth and looks glossing and healthier. Took of a start for long required treatment periods. First dose is nearly through first week and it requires a 5 months treatment. 50$+ each to see final results :(
customer_reviews.author: Hans

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t see any change in my hair following directions. Doesn’t smell clean. Just wasn’t impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Repairs all split ends and leaves hair soft and shiny
customer_reviews.text: I went from using biotin products to Keranique Works wonderful and repairs my hair also!!!
customer_reviews.author: callowac2

customer_reviews.title: Hair feels great!
customer_reviews.text: The products really make my scalp and hair feel great!
customer_reviews.author: dorothy kirk

customer_reviews.title: Great Shampoo/Conditioner
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love how soft and full it made my hair feel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: It has been 2 months and my hair is fuller and my hairline is filling out! 🙏
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recieved damage goods
customer_reviews.text: I wanna love this product I really hope it works but now Im.not sure I'd I'll find out the conditioner bottle seal was busted the rest of everything inside the package was covered in it. And apparently its not available to return or replace
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Osborn

customer_reviews.title: Great.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent in a great package. Before the time i was waiting for. Thanks to the store and USPS.
customer_reviews.author: Yira

customer_reviews.title: Dry and brittle.
customer_reviews.text: This may work for some but this made my hair so dry I had tons too using it. I don’t recommend for colored hair. I am already losing hair i don’t need what’s there to break off!!
customer_reviews.author: Denise Motl

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This is not what I expected at all. I’ve been using it for three days and it has seriously dried my hair out. For the money this cost I was expecting a better product. And of course this a non returnable product. Will not be buying this again, such a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No new hair growth. Fallout lessened
customer_reviews.text: Amount of hair fallout has decreased. No new hair growth.
customer_reviews.author: nancy f

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: I liked the product but not fair they changed the price as soon as I bought the 1st order.
customer_reviews.author: fnlcoronado

customer_reviews.title: Loosing hair. Hoping the product will thicken hair eventually.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the products for a friend's birthday on Jan. 12th. Will let you know if she,'s happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Rosalie Lucki

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The shampoo and conditioner made my hair feel like straw . Add in the lift spray and the other treatment I could barely get a comb through my hair. Not worth pulling out my hair trying to fix it
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Meyers

customer_reviews.title: Bottle leaked in shipment.
customer_reviews.text: When I received package the box that had the Regrow Treatment spray on had leaked box was soggy and instructions were wet and ink had run. Bottle had a little in it. Need replacement.
customer_reviews.author: carol bunn

customer_reviews.title: Product not safe to use!
customer_reviews.text: I was shocked at the warnings associated with using this product and then even more shocked to realize I couldn't return it! Kay DiFiore
customer_reviews.author: Kay Difiore

customer_reviews.title: Get it!
customer_reviews.text: The product works you'll see results within the first 2 weeks or little bit more, highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: mauricio murcia

customer_reviews.title: Takes months to work
customer_reviews.text: Dried my scalp out and says it will take months for before you see a difference. Disliked completely
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does it really work as the advertisement says it does?
customer_reviews.text: Yes, the product is good however it comes too often. I now have 3 shipments on hand. Cancel my subscription until I use up what I have on hand. In the future I will order when I need it. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Damaged my hair.
customer_reviews.text: This product really damaged my hair. I don’t think it did much and wasn’t worth it to me.
customer_reviews.author: LoveTheSky

customer_reviews.title: It’s a quality product.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product before and I liked it.
customer_reviews.author: Myra Thomas

customer_reviews.title: A great product
customer_reviews.text: I feel that my hair has body and thickness as well as growth so that my windows peak is not noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had a lot of time to use it to really report on it at this time, but what I have used so far I have been very pleased with.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Ellen Crocker

customer_reviews.title: Helped reduce hair loss
customer_reviews.text: Worked as advertised. I think it slowed down hair loss. Hair seems thicker, and not as many hairs in my brush.
customer_reviews.author: Cathie M.

customer_reviews.title: Losing hair more
customer_reviews.text: Started this product 2 weeks ago and I am losing so much hair.
customer_reviews.author: Nimisha

customer_reviews.title: Good introductory package
customer_reviews.text: Bottles are travel sized it’s a good introductory package though
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I don't like the product. It makes my hair feel thinner and sticky.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will not purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Dries out the scalp. Didn’t see any improvement in hair. Will not continue.

customer_reviews.title: DON’T ACCEPT RETURNS...WASTE OF MONEY!
customer_reviews.text: They product made my hair looks horribly dry! Did nothing to my hair and they DON’T ACCEPT RETURNS...WASTE OF MONEY!
customer_reviews.author: Can

customer_reviews.title: Did not see any hair regrowth
customer_reviews.text: Did not see any results except for a shiny and smooth hair. I used it as indicated religiously
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer DKA

customer_reviews.title: Pass on this
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t seen any change with this product. I wouldn’t recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great results.
customer_reviews.text: My hair loves this products, it grows faster and feels cleaner every time I use them.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Be careful when deliver the packages
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the package something is broken was messy inside I just recive it
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: My hair it’s longer now
customer_reviews.text: Because my hair looks very different now , it’s perfect for me
customer_reviews.author: Anyluz S.

customer_reviews.title: this product is very healthy for your hair
customer_reviews.text: It was given as a gift. But the person loves it, and gave it a five-star
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: TOO SOON FOR RE-GROWTH
customer_reviews.text: It's too early to know for sure if it going to work for me, but the product aroma is very pleasant and makes my hair feel clean and has more body.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie R.

customer_reviews.title: incomplete treatment
customer_reviews.text: only 3 products arrived, no 4 the package was open
customer_reviews.author: fermin Basilio

customer_reviews.title: Is it money back guerenteed?
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the product almost a month and havent seen any results. How much longer do i need to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Torres

customer_reviews.title: kerinque works great in 1st couple uses
customer_reviews.text: I always go back to this product, and fast deliveries are always 👍
customer_reviews.author: Margie

customer_reviews.title: Must try!
customer_reviews.text: It does its thing, like magic, very fast. I recommend. Thank you Keranique and Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Rolando Rollee Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this kit for my wife thinning hair after all the other product she used didn't work. She been using it for 3 months and I can see that her hair looks fuller. Would recommend this to anyone with thinning hair
customer_reviews.author: David T

product_meta.title: Keranique Hair Regrowth System – 30 Days - Keratin Amino Complex - Free of Sulfates, Dyes and Parabens, Includes Shampoo and Conditioner, Minoxidil and Lift and Repair Spray for Dry Thinning Hair
feature_bullets: Regrow Thicker, Fuller, Healthier Hair with America’s Number 1 Selling HAIR REGROWTH SYSTEM FOR WOMEN. Our 30 Days Hair Regrowth System includes Hair Volumizing Shampoo and Conditioner, Lift and Repair Spray and Regrowth Treatment. Are you ready to get the hair you desire and deserve? Then take the first step on your journey to best hair today.

CLEANSE - Scalp Nourishing Keratin Shampoo and Conditioner are scientifically formulated to gently cleanse and deliver strand-saving protection for thinning hair. The formula features Keratin Amino Complex. It helps repair split ends, smoothes the cuticle and improves fiber quality. It also incorporates scalp-soothing and protecting ingredients including Bisabolol, Allantoin, Curcumin, Apium Graveolens (Celery) Extract, to promote healthy hair follicles and scalp.

REGROW – Keranique Regrowth Treatment is specifically designed to work with a woman’s body chemistry. The Keranique Regrowth Treatment contains the only FDA approved and clinically proven non-prescription ingredient to regrow hair and revitalize hair follicles. And it is so easy to use with the new patented Easy Precision Sprayer, designed to target the regrowth treatment precisely in thinning areas.

REPAIR – Lift and Repair Spray is both treatment and styling product, adds lift and style to your hair while protecting it. Heat activated spray protects against damage from styling tools and environmental factors, infuses hair with the proprietary Keratin Amino Complex, helping to repair damage, restore shine and volume. A third-party clinical study has proven this revolutionary formula gives 24 hour frizz control while it mends 96% of split ends by sealing the hair shaft.

If you're trying to regrow hair that you have lost or would like to improve hair that you have then you must try Keranique! We have developed special formulas for all types of thinning hair, including fine, dry, damaged, color treated and curly textured hair. No more bad hair days due to thinning hair and dry scalp! Keranique Hair Products are Paraben / Sulfate / Dye / Phthalate Free, not tested on animals and manufactured in USA.
Visit our Amazon Store at amazon.com/Keranique for more information
